facts: Vending machines are deadlier than sharks — they kill about 13 people a year on average.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren’t technically berries.
Octopuses have three hearts, and two of them stop beating when they swim.
Your stomach gets a new lining every 3–4 days so it doesn’t digest itself.
There are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on all of Earth’s beaches.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped. Perfectly cubed.
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins — up to 40 minutes underwater.
Butterflies can taste with their feet.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus — it spins so slow it takes 243 Earth days to rotate once.
There’s a species of jellyfish that is technically immortal — it can revert to a younger state.
